issue.title: gazebo::sensors::Sensor::SetActive not working for ray sensor

content.raw:
This seems occurred by \[gazebo::sensors::RaySensor::IsActive\]\([#!/osrf/gazebo/src/7c2936c66a23e6c6707fe4c7790458e75824407e/gazebo/sensors/RaySensor.cc#lines-511](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/7c2936c66a23e6c6707fe4c7790458e75824407e/gazebo/sensors/RaySensor.cc#lines-511)\).

Is it necessary to make it active by force\(`return Sensor::IsActive() ||    (this->dataPtr->scanPub && this->dataPtr->scanPub->HasConnections());`\)?
content.html:
This seems occurred by [gazebo::sensors::RaySensor::IsActive](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/7c2936c66a23e6c6707fe4c7790458e75824407e/gazebo/sensors/RaySensor.cc#lines-511).

Is it necessary to make it active by force(return Sensor::IsActive() || (this->dataPtr->scanPub && this->dataPtr->scanPub->HasConnections());)?
